name: Pass The Sugar
description:
Press Space Bar to begin!

Controls:
Arrow Keys -> Move
Space Bar -> Spin

This is Kirbeast (https://itch.io/profile/kirbeast) and my entry to Trijam #120 (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-120) with the theme of Coffee! We made this game in 3 hours each and created everything but the cafe noises!

Cafe noises: https://mynoise.net/NoiseMachines/cafeRestaurantNoiseGenerator.php
